comparison.description: Determines how the food level of the player should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: Determines how the food level of the player should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value at which the food level of the player will be compared to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The value at which the food level of the player will be compared to.

type.description:
## Food Level

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/food_level)

Checks the entity's food level (chicken legs / hunger meter / whatever you wanna call it). The food level is in the range of 0 to 20.

Type ID: `origins:food_level`



---

### üìù Note

__This entity condition type will only work on players.__



---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:food_level",
    "comparison": "==",
    "compare_to": 0
}
```

This example will check if the player have 0 hunger shanks (or 0 food points).
